name: Luma Galaxy
description:
Super Luma Galaxy

 is a 2.5D Platformer. As a Luma you need to collect as many StarBits as possible and try to become a Star.

  • 3D-Models & Code made by me.
  • Music & Thumbnail are AI generated.
  • SoundEffects by Zapsplat.

This game has been made within 7 days for the Brackeys GameJam 2023.1.
